string.name: Brownies
string.body:
Melt sugar, butter and chocolates
 Mix them with beaten eggs
 Add vanilla and flour ( adding chopped nuts is optional)
 Preheat oven to 350F
 Pour the mixture in greased brownie pan and bake for 30 minutes.
 Can be enjoyed warm with vanilla ice cream!

string.name: IndianPorkCurry
string.body:
Sauté the pork in a skillet with the curry paste.
 Add the onion and cook until the onion is also done.
 Add the tomatoes with the liquid from the can, cover the pan and cook 1/2 hour with weak fire.
 Season to taste.
 Serve with cooked rice.

string.name: MashedPotatoes
string.body:
Cook the potatoes in boiling water.
 When they are cooked, peel and mash them.
 Warm the milk and the butter, and mix well with the mashed potatoes.
 Season to taste.

string.name: RoastChicken
string.body:
Preheat the oven at 200 C.
 Clean the skin of the chicken with lemon.
 Sprinkle paprika lightly all around the chicken.
 Sprinkle salt and pepper.
 Put the chicken in the oven, lower the temperature at once to 170 C, and cook for 20 to 30 minutes per pound. To check if the meat is done, poke it with a skewer. The chicken is done when there is no more red coming out.

string.name: ItalianMeatballPasta
string.body:
Mix well the meatball ingredients.
 Sauté lightly in the butter until it takes a little color. 
Half cover with the tomato sauce.
 Cook 30 minutes under low fire in a covered pan.
Serve with the cooked pastas.

string.name: TwentyMinuteChickenParmesan
string.p: 4 boneless and skinless chicken breast halves, about 1 lb.\n
string.body:
Using palm of hand flatten chicken to even thickness.
 Dip chicken into egg then into crumbs to coat.
 In skillet over medium heat, in hot margarine, brown chicken on both sides.
 Add Prego sauce.
Reduce heat.
 Cover; simmer 10 minutes.
Sprinkle with cheeses and parsley.
 Cover; simmer 5 minutes or until cheese melts.
4 servings.

string.name: CajunShrimp
string.p: 1 lb. shrimp, uncooked, shelled, and deveined\n\n
string.body:
Combine first seven ingredients in a 9" x 13" baking dish.
 Add shrimp and toss to coat.
 Refrigerate at least 1 hour.
 Preheat oven to 450 degrees.
 Bake until shrimp are cooking through, stirring occasionally, about 10 minutes.
 Can be served with fettucini alfredo and/or French bread.

string.name: Ratatouille
string.body:
Pare and cut the eggplants in thick slices.
Sprinkle with salt and let rest 10 min on some towel paper. Wash and dry.
Cube the slices.
 Mix all the vegetables and herbs in a pan, cook under medium heat about 30 min.
When the vegetables are cooked, add the olive oil and season to taste.

string.name: SpicyGrilledSalmonSteaks
string.body:
In a bowl stir together the black pepper, the paprika, the cayenne, the garlic, the onion, the thyme, the salt, and the oil until the mixture forms a stiff paste.
Pat the paste onto both sides of each salmon steak.
 Heat an oiled ridged grill pan over moderately high heat until it is smoking and in it saut? the salmon for 3 to 4 minutes on each side, or until it is cooked through.
 While the salmon is cooking, in a small skillet cook the butter over moderate heat, swirling the skillet, until it is dark brown, but do not let it burn.
Transfer the salmon to heated plates and pour the butter over it.
